goals.title: Establish protocol discovery mechanism
goals.description: Create a system that can find and catalog different AI communication protocols

goals.title: Implement protocol translation layer
goals.description: Build a translation system between different protocol standards

goals.title: Add version compatibility checking
goals.description: Ensure protocols with different versions can still communicate

evolution_steps.title: Initial Protocol Discovery
evolution_steps.outcome: System can now detect and register protocols in .ai/protocols directory
